LanguageData.WNA_BrainHarvest.label: harvest brain
LanguageData.WNA_BrainHarvest.description: harvest a fresh brain and quickly preserve it with properly mixed liquid.
LanguageData.WNA_Hemodialysis.label: blood dialysis
LanguageData.WNA_Hemodialysis.description: Use specially formulated solution to perform blood dialysis on the patient, in order to extract toxic substances accumulated in the patient's body.
LanguageData.WNA_Inspection.label: psychic inspection
LanguageData.WNA_Inspection.description: Inspect target with one's psychic power, faster and no medicine is required. This technique requires basic level of intelligence.
LanguageData.WNA_VoidDive.label: void dive
LanguageData.WNA_VoidDive.description: force a human into deep coma and turn them into a anchor. the victim must be sober to face the void, thus voidsteel can be drained through them while they're struggling to awake, to escape, or doing anything else, before their consciousness finally fades.
LanguageData.WNARecipeTo_WNA_Medikit.label: administer medicine pack
